Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1974...
Had first career hit on 7/27/1977, off Chad Romig (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/20/1977, off Ben Adrover (Ash)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1978, hitting .285 with 26 HR, 93 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1982...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1984, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston (UBA) on 6/21/1984...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1984, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Rightfield in 1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1985, hitting .462 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Coney Island on 6/1/1985...
Injured on 5/10/1986 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
